newsitem.title: ROMANIA: ROMANIAN LEU 6,991 TO DLR ON APRIL 4 - BNR.
newsitem.headline: ROMANIAN LEU 6,991 TO DLR ON APRIL 4 - BNR.

text.p: Romania's central bank (BNR) said on Friday it had calculated the indicative rate of the local leu currency at 6,991 to the dollar for April 4.

The rate, which is not compulsory for book-keeping operations or inter-bank deals, is used by the finance ministry, customs authorities, prosecutors' offices and police as well as for statistical purposes.
It is computed daily, based on prices quoted by commercial banks operating on Romania's foreign exchange market. The rate was 6,985 lei to the dollar on Thursday.
